documentId: Understanding Arguments_ An Introduction to Informal Logic (1)
content:
17.)  For  reasons  of  this
kind, most people would modify premise (1) in the following way:
(1*) An action that best increases human welfare is not morally wrong,
provided that it is not unfair.
